thread.title: Two key national assembly chiefs off to see Buhari in London
thread.title_full: Two key national assembly chiefs off to see Buhari in London

author: Nwafor Polycarp
title: Two key national assembly chiefs off to see Buhari in London
text:
Home » News » Two key national assembly chiefs off to see Buhari in London Two key national assembly chiefs off to see Buhari in London On 4:35 pm In News by Nwafor Polycarp Comments 
By Nwafor Sunday 
Abuja – Senate President Bukola Saraki and Speaker, House of Representatives, Yakubu Dogara, have allegedly reported by newsmen to have departed Abuja for London to meet President Muhammadu Buhari. It was gathered that the two principal officers left Abuja on Wednesday morning. Yusuf Dogara, House of Reps speaker and Bukola Saraki, Senate President 
The two chief officers of the National Assembly had last week spoken with the President on phone. Buhari, on the advice of his doctors, has been on an extended vacation in the United Kingdom, fuelling speculations about the status of his health. Special Adviser on Media to Senate President, Yusuph Olaniyonu declined to speak on the visit. When contacted, he said: “I don’t know about that. I don’t have any information on it.” We are left to dig more to unravel the fact about this story. Nwafor Polycarp
